sourcesContent: import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FormBuilder, FormGroup } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.scss'] }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit { otherDataForm: FormGroup; showHorizontalLines: boolean = false; showVerticalLines: boolean = false; constructor(private formBuilder: FormBuilder) { this.otherDataForm = this.formBuilder.group({ width: null, height: null, horizontalLines: null, verticalLines: null }); } ngOnInit(): void {} getLinesArray(linesCount: number): number[] { return Array.from({ length: linesCount }, (_, index) => index + 1); } onSubmit(): void { // Handle form submission // Access the form values using this.otherDataForm.value } }
